author: rbb
msg: Make piped logs work again in 2.0.  The next step is reliable piped logs.

author: sascha
msg: os/$(OS_DIR) is now equivalent to the old $(OS_DIR)
Necessary include paths are added only in VPATH mode.
Dependencies are stored in the build directory now.
They contain paths which depend on the current build,
and therefore they are not general.

author: rse
msg: Fix more stuff in mod_mime documentation:
AddType uses MIME-type in its synopsis, not MIME-enc.

author: sascha
msg: Most of the support programs are created during the build, so we can expect

author: sascha
msg: Always create the target directory, if it does not exist. Also use the
Makefile template from the source tree.
